definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_data_integer_set"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:PrairieDog</field><field name="accessor">animationTime</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Sets the default time for the new animation.</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="value"><block type="entity_data_integer_get"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:PrairieDog</field><field name="accessor">animationTimeDefault</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Checks if the entity is standing.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="entity_data_string_get"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:PrairieDog</field><field name="accessor">animation</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">standing</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_data_string_set"><field name="customEntity">CUSTOM:PrairieDog</field><field name="accessor">animation</field><comment h="76" pinned="false" w="219">If the entity is standing the entity animation changes to normal so it can run away.</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">normal</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
